short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Route requests to given urls to same url with pageSize=XXX parameter to enable larger pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed for Thingsboard.io plattform. 

Currently, there is no way you can set a page size other than 10 programmatically. This can be tedious, especially if you have lots of devices, integrations, etc. to manage.

When installed, you can specify URLs "x" which are instantly forwarded to "x?pageSize=50" for example. 

Tip: the URL shoud match exactly, just copy the complete path from your browser when visiting the site.
